connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

subnet.description:
"description: 
 parameters:
     boot_mode:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Default boot mode for interfaces assigned to this subnet, valid values are'Static', 'DHCP'
     dns_primary:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Primary DNS for this subnet
     from:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Starting IP Address for IP auto suggestion
     network:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Subnet network
     subnet_parameters_attributes:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: Array of parameters (name, value)
     tftp_id:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: TFTP Capsule ID to use within this subnet
     ipam:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: IP Address auto suggestion mode for this subnet, valid values are 'DHCP','Internal DB', 'None'
     mask:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Netmask for this subnet
     vlanid:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: VLAN ID for this subnet
     network_type:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Type or protocol, IPv4 or IPv6, defaults to IPv4
     dhcp_id:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: DHCP Capsule ID to use within this subnet
     to:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Ending IP Address for IP auto suggestion
     discovery_id:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: ID of Discovery Capsule to use within this subnet for managing connectionto discovered hosts
     location_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: REPLACE locations with given ids
     dns_id:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: DNS Capsule ID to use within this subnet
     domain_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: Domains in which this subnet is part
     dns_secondary:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Secondary DNS for this subnet
     gateway:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Primary DNS for this subnet
     organization_ids:
       required: false
       type: array
       description: REPLACE organizations with given ids.
     name:
       required: false
       type: string
       description: Subnet name
     "

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).
